ValidationRule.description: Restrict to not let a Custom Development Opportunity (New or Change Order) leave the Qualify stage unless a Contact Role has been assigned.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( of_Contact_Roles__c =0, of_quotes__c >0, RecordType.Name = 'Custom' || RecordType.Name = 'Change_Order_NEW', ISPICKVAL(StageName , 'Discovery')||ISPICKVAL(StageName , 'Estimation')|| ISPICKVAL(StageName , 'Proposal')||ISPICKVAL(StageName , 'Nurture') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Contact Name on Quote is required to move to next stage
